## encodeULEB128 variable

Encodes unsigned integer `x` into LEB128 varint format and returns encoded bytes. Values &lt; 0 will be encoded as zero.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
encodeULEB128: (x: number) => Uint8Array
```
